term.title: constitutional isomerism

item.text: Isomerism between structures differing in constitution and described by different line formulae e.g. CH3OCH3 and CH3CH2OH.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2205 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)
